data.title: Lyle Lovett Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Lyle Lovett with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Was born and resides in Klein, Texas, which was named after his great-great-grandfather, Adam Klein

As a journalism student at Texas A&M, interviewed performers such as Nanci Griffith and Michael Martin Murphey

Studied in Germany as a graduate student

Released his self-titled debut album in 1986

Gained widespread popularity not for his music but for his marriage to Julia Roberts, whom he met on the set of The Player

The two married after a three-month courtship

In 2004, suffered a broken leg and several fractured ribs after a bull charged at him as he was walking on his uncle's farm
